title: New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Visitor Center Renovation  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Visitor Center Renovation  ** The Visitor Center Will Be Closed on April 12, 2016 for Renovation. Check our website for updates on the renovation progress and our Grand Re-opening Date.  All programs and performances will be held at the Old U.S. Mint. 504-589-2265  **
